page.title: 11STOKENCHURCH HEALTH CENTRE.
page.content: At this centre,purpose_built in 1973, many aspects of{community health}are covered by 4 doctors & their support team.Each Dr. has 2_2,500 patients. Two receptionists book appointments & do secreterial work. A practice nurse assists with casualties,{immunisation, dressings etc. A physio_therapist & speech therapist hold weekly clinics; a chiropodist fortnightly ones. A midwife & 2{health visitors}hold {ante_natal classes}& a baby clinic. Four district nurses help people at home. A school nurse checks children at 5,8 & 11 yrs.The health visitors give advice on all aspects of children's health & problems to do with the elderly.The centre is linked to a central computer:immunisation programmes are computerised & work efficiently.Next year child development will be added.
